text: Diary of a Wimpy Kid is a 2021 movie. It is based on the novel of the same name written by Jeff Kinney. Diary of a Wimpy Kid was released on Disney+. It was the first Diary of a Wimpy Kid movie to be released by Walt Disney Pictures after Disney's ownership of the franchise. Diary of a Wimpy Kid was the first animated movie in the franchise. It was the fifth installment of the franchise. Diary of a Wimpy Kid was the reboot of the live action movies. title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid (2021 movie)
